xwikidoc.name: EducationalLevelSheet
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: EducationalLevelClass Sheet
xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}} {{html wiki=true}} ## You can modify this page to customize the presentation of your object. ## At first you should keep the default presentation and just save the document. #macro(editEducationSystems $edsystems $selected) <select name="CurrikiCode.EducationalLevelClass_0_education_system"> #foreach($edsystem in $edsystems) <option value="$edsystem" #if("$!selected" == "$!edsystem") selected="selected" #end >$xwiki.getDocument($edsystem).title</option> #end </select> #end
#if($context.action == 'inline') ; $msg.get('core.editors.content.titleField.label') : <input type="text" name="title" value="$escapetool.xml($doc.title)" size="30" /> #else = ${doc.displayTitle} = #end
#if($context.action == 'inline') ; $msg.get('core.editors.content.parentField.label') : <input type="text" name="parent" value="$escapetool.xml($doc.parent)" size="30" class="suggestDocuments" /> #else ; $msg.get('core.editors.content.parentField.label') : $xwiki.getDocument("$!doc.parent").title #end
#if($context.action == 'inline') ; education_system #set($edsystems = $util.arrayList) #set($discard = $edsystems.add("AssetMetadata.InternationalEducation")) #set($discard = $edsystems.addAll($xwiki.searchDocuments(", BaseObject as obj where doc.fullName=obj.name and doc.fullName<>'CurrikiCode.EducationSystemTemplate' and obj.className='CurrikiCode.EducationSystemClass'"))) : #editEducationSystems($edsystems "$doc.getValue('education_system')") #else ; education_system : $xwiki.getDocument("$!doc.getValue('education_system')").title #end
#* #set($class = $doc.getObject('CurrikiCode.EducationalLevelClass').xWikiClass) #foreach($prop in $class.properties) ; $prop.prettyName : $doc.display($prop.getName()) #end *# {{/html}} {{/velocity}}
